articles.title: I’m a Cancer Dietitian, and This Is the Fruit I Recommend to Lower Your Cancer Risk - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
articles.description: Recent insights from leading cancer dietitians reveal that incorporating pears into your diet can significantly reduce the risk of cancer.
articles.content:

articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Study Reveals Dopamine’s Limited Role in Rapid Neural Activity - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A recent study has found that dopamine signals have a minimal impact on rapid neural activity in the striatum, challenging existing theories about dopamine's role in brain signaling.
